values:
Hey everyone!

I was packing and stuff, but Karissa is studying and I feel bad making noise even though I'm sure I already pissed her off with what packing I did do.  O-well chemistry is a hard final so I'll be kind! hehe (Even though, I'm sure the typing is annoying too, eep =(  )  

Ok, so, I'm leaving for Ireland on January 17 and arriving on the 18th in the morning.  Classes start on the 23 so those free days will be spent unpacking, settling in, exploring, and hopefully making Irish friends! hehe

The term ends on April 24 and I will then be doing one of two things.  

1.  Immediately coming home then repacking for a three week trip to Ghana (West Africa) On May 14.
The greatest part about this trip is that its completely and utterly FREE!!  Yep, plane ticket and all ('cept for presents!)  I will get 6 political science credit and 6 Honor's credits, which will put me over the top! I wonder if you can graduate with double distinguished honors?  hehe One only catch . . . I have to be accepted.  There was a resume, essay, and interview in front of a committee of about 4 people.  Yeah, I'll know if I made it by Friday.  There were 15 applicants and 2 get to go, so we'll see.  I'll keep you all updated (if you care or not!)

2.  Flying to England and staying with my family for about 3 weeks, than hoping a flight to Italy to study Art and Italian for a month, while traveling to Rome, Venice, Florence, and Naples (nipples HAH!)  This will start on May 22 - June 23.  I will have to take out a loan for this trip, but I think I should get it all done before it's too late to do anything cool. Right?  I should have to go through an acceptance thing for this one too, but I was invited by my drawing professor who wants me to major in art, so he already told me that I can go.  (It's not the hard, he hasnt filled all the spots yet, thats why! hehe)

I don't know which one I want to do more!  If I get accepted to Ghana then I'll probably do that because this Summer Honor's thing is a really big deal to be accepted to, and its free.  But I really really really reeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeally wanna go to Italy. I guess I could do it next year.

Alright, well I'll be home tomorrow.  
Lata foos
Kristen

What weird misc. thing are you?

Bunny/Pancake

I have no idea what you are.

Click Here to Take This Quiz
Brought to you by YouThink.com quizzes and personality tests.
This was taken from Cara! hehe Ok, so here's the story. Instead of going to England I will now be studying in Dublin, Ireland in the spring! WEEEEEEEEEEE I am sooooooooo excited! Theres also this airport or something that flys you all over europe for free! You just have to pay the taxes and stuff but it comes out unbelievably cheap! So, that excites me as well. Oh, I also figured I would study Political Science and do a possible minor in Sociolgy which is good because Ireland has a really good Sociology department and I can take 15 credits and they can allcount for something which means I won't be too far behind, so thats cool. Well thats all I have for now. P.S. Everyone should begin making arrangements to come visit me on St. Patty's Day! And we'll party with the TRUE irish! Later folks Kristen
Political Science and Sociology??  Maybe a law degree later?  huh?

Ok let me just get this out there . . . I hate Lock Haven University

Ok, now let me explain.

As you all know, I think, I would be going to England in the spring for the semester, right?  Well, I just recently found out that Plymouth isn't going to be excepting any exchange students for the semester.  Now, keep in mind I was told, along with five other people, that we would be studying abroad in England in the spring.  So, needless to say I am a little upset and very confused.  There is still a chance that I will be going I just have to wait a whole week to find out whats going on.  In the meantime I have to schedule classes for both England and LHU, just in case.  Also, I have no gen.eds. left to take which means the time has come to decide on a major.  Oh, and I don't want to major in psychology anymore.  I am now thinking about international studies and when I told my mom shes like and what are you going to do with that?  Shit, I don't know!  I don't know anything.  Hm . . . I just have alot to think about and accomplish in a short time and I just wanted to vent.  So, I apoligize for being whiny and stuff.  I'm just really confused and in a bit of a bad mood.  But anyway . . . um . . . yeah.  I'm done.  

Later
Kristen

Hey everyone!

Does anyone remember the Holocaust?  Well, what if I told you that it is still going on today?  Well, it is!  There is still genocide going on in Africa!  The Sudan needs your help!  If you are interested in helping I am selling t-shirts that say "Stop the genocide!"  They are $12.00 and the proceeds go to the International Rescue Committee.  Please, if you want to let me know and I can give you more information.  This is a really good cause and it will raise awareness, because you don't know how many people don't even know what Sudan is.  

Thanks!!
Kristen

Oi!

Whats up?  So I went home this weekend and it was really boring but fun at the same time.  My mom, sister, and I played with an elmo doll for like an hour!  "Elmo went to the POTTY!" hahaha That was great.

So, last night my soldier pen pal in Bagdad called me.  hehe He's funny and he sent me a picture of himself in a towel! haaha (don't worry that wasn't the firt picture he sent me)Yeah, hes hot, but in Iraq.  We've been talking through e-mail and now recently on te phone for about a month now, I think. hehe

Aw . . . I love watching saved by the bell in the morning!  Such a good way to start the day! hehe

So, not too much longer before I get to go to England!  I have so much to do to get ready.  I need to find somewhere to get a picture taken for my passport and and international ID.  

Kay, so I'll later!
Kristen

A little update . . . 

Hey there!

I'm going to England this Spring for the semester, so start saving for plane tickets over spring break, I will be expecting visitors!

Had our first party at 228 Campus Village, Quite a success!  Even though those cops made us turn down the music! haha

Went to PSU during the Ohio State game!  Awesome to see the thousdands of people everywhere!  Then of Hookah!  Check out my picutes!  Good times

Good Weekend, I just wish I had all my friends here!  I miss you guys so much!

Kristen

Hey there, 

Um . . . so school's going by insanely fast!  I've been here for a month already.  I get to go home next weekend, I can't wait.  It's my birthday soon. . . blah.  It s Rachel's and Bartley's soon too.  Jeez we're so old.  Especially you Rachel!  

Deep Blue Sea is on!  SWEET.

Ok, I was gonna say more but I don't feel like it anymore.  
Lata
kristen

Hey guys

Whats up?  It has been a hectic first couple weeks and not quite getting any better. O-well at least I'll learn how to budget me time.  

I am now a leader of two activity groups for the Honors progam. . . Global Aid and Video seris.  Global Aid is our volunteer group where we help out the world!  Yeah, world.  It didnt start off to well but now i think its gonna get better.  We are allowed to raise funds which means more funner (yeees) projects to do.  This week we wrote letters to the troops and I think we're gonna adopt a child this week.  yep like those commercials we see.  Also, our honors director is really excited about the group so hes planning trips for us and everything.  Karissa and my other group is a movie watching group. . . during one of our meetings the Director metioned that no one picked up the group and they need someone, so Karissa and I decide Hey, why not?  So were gonna watch international movies like Amalie, Motorcycle Diaries and so on.  So yeah, and we get paid for the hours that are above what we need, which means ill get paid so some of this crap!  SWEET.

Anyway . . . I'm going to a meeting tomorrow about planning a trip to the Gulf over Thanksgiving, and I really wanna do it.  Lets hope its not too much money!

I finally have a somewhat plan for my future . . . or just a major.  Psychology with minors in international studies and biology.  I have it somewhat worked out where I can get double credit for alot of my classes.  That way I don't have to go to school for and extra million years.  Even thought that would be better than getting a job.  Or paying back loans.

Karissa, Amy, and I are all doing Habitat for Humanity this Saturday so that should be fun.  Well thats it for now.

Later gator
Kristen

Hey there

Sorry about leaving you hanging on the last post.  I haven't had a computer since i got here because stupid dell took too long sending it to me.  O-well.  I shall have it when I go home this weekend.  Gosh, it feels like Ive been at school fooooooooooooreeeeeeeeeeeeeeeever!  and it's only been like 5 days. Can't wait to go home though and get my computer and to play Kareoke revolution!! who0o.  that'll be fun.  

So yeah, about my major.  I think i might do business (i know, not exciting) because I wanna start my own.  I wanna own this cute little tea house and an irish pub.  but i was looking at all the classes i would have to take and they all really suck.  So i was also thinking since LHU only offers business administration I would only minor in it since you dont even need a degree to start a business.  I could just take classes like finance and business law and other helpfull ones and major in something else.  What you may hear yourself asking . . . i dont know maybe pychology or sociology, just cause i like to learn about that stuff.

But i dont know . . . im going to talk to my advisor tomorrow so maybe she could help (yeah right).  OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOh yeah, damn LHU neglected to tell me that Liverpool, England will not be offered as a choice for spring semester!  So now im looking at plymouth or scottland.  They both sound really cool so I hope this will still work out.

well i dont feel like typing anymore . . . so ill talk to y'all later
Kristen!

Wowie two whole updates in one day!

I haven't posted all summer and I kinda dont feel like typing everything I did out.  Anyway . . . I'm back at school in my new cool dude apartment!  It's great . . . there're three of us here but it works out nicely!  Well now that Im back I'll prolly update more for your reading pleasure and I have a huge surprise for everyone!!!!  It has something to do with my major!  More to come soon . . . later!

ATTENTION: ANYONE IN THE SCRANTON AREA

7:30 pm nightly in front of the Lackawanna County Courthouse: Please join in a vigil for peace in the Middle East, and in support of our troops to BRING THEM HOME!

This peaceful demonstration is in conjunction with Cindy Sheehan and Camp Casey.

60% of Americans say the war in Iraq "isn't worth it"

Please- - if you believe it isn't worth it - the lives, lies, and debt, spread the word! Join us! And re-post this message!



I posted that cause Rachel said to . . . and because it's a great cause so please if you have the time stop by and show your support for our troops.

hey its been a while . . . as usual

Went to New York yesterday.  It was awesome.  We decided to go after star wars on thursday morning at 3:00 am.  Ahhh gotta love being spontaneous.  it was fun so was star wars, which new kitty negelcted to tell me we were going to it til we were already on the way.  anyway . . . i bought this spa treatment day thing that includes a hair cut, massage (body massage! hehe), manicure and pedicure, waxings, and other stuff for an incredibly low price of 30.00.  it was cool this guy just kinda pulled me off the street and was like hey wanna go to a spa?  so keri and i are going.  at first it was 60.00 but then he said he'd give us two for 60 so keri said shed go! weeeeeee it'll be fun.  

Oh and we saved a couple pumas, cept for bart now he has to do online puma saving.  o-well.

So its summer and im bored, cant wait for work to start. ummm . . . 

ok im going
lata homes
kristen

So Im done with finals and I waiting for vince to get here.

Damn it right when you get everything situated and into a nice routine with some great friends you have to leave.  Now i have to go get settled in at home again, then eventually leave.  This sucks

Anyway, weeeeee i get to come home! (haha kinda mixed feelings)

Alright back to cleaning / packing

Can't wait to see everyone maybe tonight.

But im gonna miss my people here =(

Damn it!

BAck to the drawing board
Kristen

Jeepers . . . why do i not wanna come home?

Why are boys stupid?

We should get a week to stay at college with nothing to do.

so its early and im up.

Going to breakfast with Karissa and Amy then a little study time then to the gym for out 2 hour workout folloed by some lunch.

SO Dennis came over to watch family guy last night!  squeee hehe.  It's too bad that we only have like 3 days left.  0-well next semester hehe.  its cute cause he's shy and im actually the one doing all the talking/inviting.  but hes the one who keeps initiating conversation.  so he's eating dinner with us tonight.

I still have to write a paper. it sucks but im gonna try really hard to get alot of it done today.  im done with finals on wednesday but not going home til thursday night.

I almost don't even feel like going home now.  

Maybe a trip to Philly to visit ben this weekend . . . kinda  a a vacation type thing for me.  im gonna drive there by myself since no one will go to yellowstone with me! (someone's getting their tonsils out!)

Alright gott to go

Peace Love and Sprinkles!
Kristen
i got my hair cut . . . and if anyone would like to tell me how to out pictures on this thing i'll show you . . . or you can wait til i come home

Your Birthdate: October 3
Being born on the 3rd day of the month is likely to add a good bit of vitality to your life. The energy of 3 allows you bounce back rapidly from setbacks, physical or mental. There is a restlessness in your nature, but you seem to be able to portray an easygoing, "couldn't care less" attitude. You have a natural ability to express yourself in public, and you always make a very good impression. Good with words, you excel in writing, speaking, and possibly singing. You are energetic and always a good conversationalist. You have a keen imagination, but you tend to scatter your energies and become involved with too may superficial matters. You are affectionate and loving, but sometimes too sensitive. You are subject to rapid ups and downs.
What Does Your Birth Date Mean?
Ohhh I bet you all had something to say about the singing part! hehe Karissa, Amy, and I went to Dunkin Doughnuts last night from before 10 til 4 . . . that was fun. We met some guys who were cool - Abe, Jeff, and Sam. To picture Sam imagine casey and matthew lillard as one person . . . it was uncanny! hehe Finals soon . . . then home on thursday Ok thats it .. . um . . . ciao Kristen

Ok so this weekend i've been in a bad mood . . . but tonight was cool.  I got to see sugarcult in concert! who0o0 they came here to play with vanessa carlton, who is really cool (her live show is a little boring but shes really funny).  then after the concert i got all of them to sign my shirt.  so it ruled! 

My mommys coming to visit me tomorrow. weeeeee

Ok thats it . . . thank you and good bye

I just took my World Politics exam and managed to forget everything!!!
I had to write two essays, i got part of one right but then confused the UN with the EU and with how much they were worth . . . i failed.

And the worst part is that while walking with karissa, i said i was gonna forget and fail and she said have you ever failed anything yet? no, then youre not gonna fail.

Well that worked didn't it.

Oh and add one more assignment to my list thats all due in the sam two days!


Its time for this shit to end now, Time for summer to come

Aww nobody updates anymore . . . that makes me sad.

Actually I just don't wanna do anymore work and I keep procrastinating and checking my mail and aways messages and LJ.  hehe you know how it goes.






so . . . Bleh



um . . . keri and ashley got to see BSB again tonight in Pittsburgh. NOT FAIR! o-well ashley called me so I got to listen to alot of it . . . hehe


Ok well back to the neverending pile of work thats just staring me in the face.
Later gator
After a while crocidile
(I just replied to myself . . . thats sad)

hey-ho everyone!

Im back here at school for a bit. . . i get to come home again for New Kitty's play! Friday and Saturday at 9 for those who are home and would like to go . . .ashley and i will prolly go to both cause we're losers and have nothing else to do . . . and oh cause NK's in it too.

So. . . OHMIGOD this past weekend was awesome! Seeing the backstreet boys again was so great. I miss being 14. I got to hug AJ! and i shook Kevins hand (his eye brows almost got me but i made a dashing escape) and Brian said hi to Keri on tape!  i miss them already, i wanna go back to last saturday. ill even wait the four hours outside in the freezing cold with flip flops on again!!!

Some memories:
Drunk Girl
Ashley hiding 2 disposable cameras in the bra 
Rachel hiding 1 disgital camera in her bra
freezing toes and sharing rachels shoes
Hugging AJ, shaking kevins hand, and being oh so close to brian
That homeless man
feeling like 14 again!

kay well thats it . . . cause i don't feel like typing anything else
Lata home cats!

So hey!

Im pretty sure im gonna be coming home on Friday instead on tuesday! yes i am going to skip four classes! ahhh i feel bad already! gawd i am such a dork!  

But do you know what coming home on friday means? yes four extra days home but also . . . going to ashleys!!! weeee  hehe hopefully anyway.

I am so sick of studying for my damn history midterm. i am so bad at studying too and i dont know how and ive been studying since sunday!!!  i cant wait til lunch tomorrow cuase then ill be pretty much home free til break! weeee

ok well i better get back to studying! im so bored.


BSB NEXT SATURDAY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!1!!

Good Ole' PSU


Yeah so this weekend was really fun. 

On Friday i actually got a bit of a paper done that isn't due til tuesday (I wanna try and write a bunch more today).  Then Dinner with the peeps left here for the weekend.  Then i showered and Amy came up to watch a movie to waste time before going to the football house at li8ke 10.  we watched Whats Eating Gilbert Grape . . . Great Movie!  So I decided that after the party I was gonna stay over Amy's so we went to her dorm after the movie.  Then waited around for Thriston and Erie to call so we could go.  Then they did, hehe , right on time I might add!  SO we walked in the blistering cold to the football house and partyed.  Well I drank like 4 cups of beer but for soem reason didnt feel it so i stopped.  Amy managed to find herself a nice guy very quickley and was with him for the night and so I just hung around Thriston and we danced and stuff.  NOt too bad.  So we left at like 1:30 and AMy and I ordered pizza then slept.  

Saturday we got up and ate then got I got ready for AShley to come! weeee.  when she got here we just hung out a bit then went to Wally with amy and thriston.  then dinner. then it was off to Penn State to visit bartley!!!!! yay.  so much fun.  we went to THON which is like this 48 hour dance a thon thing thats like a really big deal to people who go to penn state, i dont understand it though its just a hell of a lot of people, not dancing no, but just standing.  it should be called the Stand a Thon!  SO anyway after that we went for some coffee at Starbucks, then to 2000 degrees.  THis is where you get to pick out a piece of ceramic and paint it then they fire it and its sooooooooo awesome!  so we each made a shot glass but we dont get it till spring break cuase it take a couple days to fire so Bart is just gonna bring it home for us.  after that we decided to go to the Huka Lounge. so we sat down in a circle of nice big comfy chairs and with an awesome band and just smoked and talked! very cool.  Amy and I shared a banana flavored one, bart had rose, and ashley had vanilla.  all very good. then after the band ended they went arounf and talked to everyone and now they want to come play for us here in LHU so they're gonna emial us and see what we can do. cool.  so we left and ate at Jimmy John's, an awesome sandwhich place! soooooooooo good!  hmmm then what . . .oh yeah we stopped in at this frat but it was really retarded so we left (kicked out?) and took a nice walked back to bartley's where we watched creepy cartoons and then crashed with ellen making us laugh.  which bring me to today

Sunday ate brunch at bart's.  yummy.  now im here and ashley's gone.  sad.  i tried napping but didnt work so i showered and now i think im gonna try to do some work before dinner.

Monday-Wednesday-Friday

Mon - 3:10 - 5:00 Bio Lab

11:00-12:15 Honors world History

Love y'all 
Kristen
